summary: The document is an Indenture dated November 17, 2025, between Lucid Group, Inc. and U.S. Bank Trust Company, National Association, as Trustee, governing the issuance of 7.00% Convertible Senior Notes due 2031. It outlines the terms and conditions of the Notes, including definitions, payment terms, conversion rights, repurchase and redemption options, covenants, and events of default. The Indenture also details the roles and responsibilities of the Trustee and provides for amendments, satisfaction, and discharge of the Indenture.
